item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: GDPR Privacy Policy for BishSMP At BishSMP, accessible at bishsmp.xyz, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by BishSMP and how we use it. If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us through email at admin@bishsmp.xyz General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) We are a Data Controller of your information.

item.title: How to join the server on PS4, PS5, XBOX and Switch
item.description: This is a tutorial for BedrockConnect for information click the link. PS4 & PS5 Open the Settings Page Once here, click on Network On the left panel; click on settings Beside the left panel, select set up internet connection If you are connected to wi-fi you can find your network under Registered Networks select your network and press X and choose advanced settings From here you can configure your DNS settings As you can see from the images you set the DNS settings to manual, but for this to work you have to set your Primary DNS to 45.

item.title: Welcome to the BishSMP
item.description: Welcome Bish Students to BishSMP to join just use our ip bishsmp.xyz For those of you console I have created a tutorial which will help you join.
